page.title: 03PARTRIDGE GREEN RELIGION
page.content: ST.MICHAEL'S C.E.CHURCH built in 1890 of flint is situated in the middle of the village.It has a beautiful STAINED GLASS WINDOW in which the angels wings are made of peacocks feathers.About 100 villagers,mainly women attend church every SUNDAY.On Sundays there is a 9.30am.MORNING SERVICE and a 5.30pm.EVENING SONG SERVICE.There are many young families in the village whose children go to the SUNDAY SCHOOL.They listen to Bible stories,put on plays and go on outings.THE RECTOR,MR.BALL retires in July 1985.He is one of the Primary School Governors and takes the school assembly every Wednesday morning.He is well known and liked in the village.
